strategy: Elysian Drop Troops armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: All formations have a Initiative of 2+.

formations.name: 0-1 Regimental HQ
formations.units: One Elysian Supreme Commander with a Commissar and seven Elysian Drop Troops plus transport.

formations.name: Drop Troop Company
formations.units: One Elysian Commander with a Commissar and seven Elysian Drop Troops plus transport.

sections.name: Elysian Support Formations
sections.description: Up to two Support Formations for each Core Company.

formations.name: Sentinel Squadron
extraUnits: Replace all Sentinels with Armoured Sentinels: 25 points
Replace all Sentinels with Support Sentinels: 50 points

formations.name: Storm Trooper Company
formations.units: Eight Elysian Storm Troopers, one with a Commissar, plus transport.

formations.name: Support Platoon
formations.units: Four Elysian Support Squads or four Elysian Mortar Squads plus transport

formations.name: Tauros Venator Squadron
extraUnits: Add up to two Tauros Venators: 25 points each

sections.name: Static Defenses & Imperial Navy Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations. Up to one Tarantula formation for each Tauros Recon Squadron

extraUnits: Replace the Lunar Class Cruiser with an Emperor Class Battleship: 25 points

upgrades.title: Elysian Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: Drop Sentinels
items.description: Replace two Elysian Drop Troops with two Drop Sentinels and one Sky Talon

items.name: Fire Support
items.description: Replace two Elysian Drop Troops with two Elysian Fire Support Squads
